resources.string: A concentration of dark energy, which reinvigorates demons.
Used by bodybuilders. Buffs your muscles and gives you a gruff appearance. (Charisma +1)
Made of seventeen different herbs, this natural wonder helps you regain your inner focus. (Charm +1)
A spoonful of this rare delicacy is said to counter any misfortune bound to happen to you. (Luck +1)
This lifesaver plugs directly into the Demonscope and gives another chance to find demons nearby.
Thanks to the marvels of cloud computing, the Demonscope can now find more demons on the map.
